title: Theodor W. Adorno
summary: Theodor W. Adorno (/əˈdɔːrnoʊ/;[8] German: [ˈteːodoːɐ̯ ʔaˈdɔɐ̯no] (listen);[9][10] born Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund; 11 September 1903 – 6 August 1969) was a German philosopher, sociologist, psychologist, musicologist, and composer known for his critical theory of society.
